offerText: Shop & Enjoy Savings 15% Off On All Kitchens, Limited Offer For Kitchens Only

profile.welcomeIKEA: Welcome home to your IKEA account
profile.welcomeIKEADescription: Here you can find and update information connected to your account.
profile.p_Details_details: View and edit your profile details
profile.p_Planner_details: View and edit your saved designs

product.productViews: people have viewed this product today

PD.Selecting_preferred: Selecting a preferred store ensures that you don’t miss out on offers from your favourite IKEA store, as well as help you to stay informed about product availability and stock information.
PD.Manage_your_addresses: Manage your addresses for a quick and easy checkout experience

Edit_User.F_Name_empty: The first name field cannot be left empty
Edit_User.L_Name_empty: The last name field cannot be left empty
Edit_User.info: The information below is linked to your account and, for security reasons, cannot be changed

Login.LoginAccount_details: Get a more personalised experience where you don’t need to fill in your information every time
Login.LoginIKEA: Log in or join IKEA today to benefit from a more personalized experience
Login.EmailEmpty: The email (username) field cannot be left empty
Login.PasswordEmpty: The password field cannot be left empty
Login.SubmitErrorMsg: The email address or password you entered is incorrect or the account does not exist in IKEA Egypt

Register.RegisterForm: From your profile, you will find all information connected to your account.
Register.F_Name_empty: The first name field cannot be left empty
Register.L_Name_empty: The last name field cannot be left empty
Register.Email_Empty: The email (username) field cannot be left empty
Register.password_empty: The password field cannot be left empty
Register.password_valid: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and one special character.
Register.password_minlen: Password must be at least 8 characters long
Register.privacy_policy_ErrorMsg: You must have read and accepted the privacy policy
Register.Accept_privacy_policy: I have read and understood the
Register.SubmitErrorMsg: An account matching this email already exist.

Delete_Account.Delete_account_details: Time to say goodbye? We miss you already! The following happens when you delete your account:
Delete_Account.P_Li1: You delete all personal information and your shopping lists.
Delete_Account.P_Li2: You will no longer have access to your account or be able to enjoy any member benefits.
Delete_Account.P_Li3: For tax and other legal reasons, we will keep your purchase history.
Delete_Account.delete_warning: Remember that you are always welcome back!
Delete_Account.ConfirmDelete: Confirm with your password to continue and delete your account.
Delete_Account.Password_mismatch: Password mismatch. Please enter the correct password and try again.

ChangePassword.title: Change password
ChangePassword.description: It's a good idea to update your password regularly and to make sure it's unique from other passwords you use.
ChangePassword.Current_password_empty: The current password field cannot be left empty
ChangePassword.New_password_empty: The new password field cannot be left empty
ChangePassword.confirmPasswordRequired: The confirm new password field cannot be left empty

ikeaWelcomeText: Welcome to IKEA Egypt! Find the <deals>best deals</deals> on <furniture>furniture products</furniture>, <lighting>lighting</lighting> and <decoration>home decoration</decoration>! Choose from our range of cosy <living>living room furniture</living> and comfortable <dining>dining room furniture</dining>. Start browsing now and you're sure to find something you'll love!

emptyBag.title: Your bag is empty
emptyBag.description: You can add products to your shopping bag, either by searching or by browsing products.

cart.byClicking: By clicking to 'check out' you're agreeing to our Privacy Policy
cart.it'sok: It's ok to change your mind!
cart.discription: If you're not totally satisfied with your IKEA purchase, you can return it within 90 days, together with proof of purchase, for a full refund. Refunds will be made in the same form of payment originally used to make the purchase.
cart.enjoying: Enjoy the benefit of 90 days to return unopened products.
cart.exploring: Explore IKEA's return policy for more information
cart.validation: www.ikea.com is validated as a secure site for sending and receiving sensitive data by DigiCert OV SSL Certificate.
cart.technology: The SSL technology encrypts the communication between the web browser and website, ensuring that no information can be intercepted or accessed by a third party.
cart.areyousure: Do you want to empty your bag?
cart.makeClear: All items and designs will be removed from your bag.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: Sorry, the product you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
